headline: 2024 Presidential Election Republicans Az Ga And Pa Draft Legislation Remove Biden Ballot
summary: Three Republican lawmakers drafted legislation to remove President Biden from the Democratic primary ballots in their states on Friday.The Details:Representatives Aaron Bernstine (R-PA), Charlice Byrd (R-GA), and Cory Mcgarr (R-AZ) released ajoint statementthat cited their motivation as showing the “absurdity” of Colorado’s decision to remove President Trump from the state’s ballot.For Context:Earlier this week, the Colorado Supreme Courtcontroversiallyordered Trump’s name beremoved from the state’s Republican primary balloton the premise that he violatedSection 3 of the 14th Amendment, which disqualifies candidates who have “engaged in insurrection.”Key Quote:The statement said, “By their very own interpretation of the law, Joe Biden is 100% not eligible to run for political office. Democrats’ insane justification to remove Trump can just as easily be applied to Joe Biden for his ‘insurrection’ at the southern border and his alleged corrupt family business dealings with China… To be clear, our objective is to showcase the absurdity of Colorado’s decision and allow ALL candidates to be on the ballot in all states.”How The Media Covered It:Breitbart News (Right)was the first to report the story. The newswascoveredalmostexclusivelyby outlets on the Right, but not by large mainstream outlets likeFox News (Right bias),New York Post (Lean Right bias), orNational Review (Lean Right bias). As of December 24,Newsweek (Center bias)was the only Center-rated source AllSides found coverage from. AllSides did not find coverage from any outlets on the left.
